section.title: Registering from the Installed System
section.para: If you have skipped the registration during the installation or want to re-register your system, you can register the system at any time using the &yast; module Product Registration or the command line tool SUSEConnect.

To register the system start YaSTSoftwareProduct Registration. Provide the E-mail address associated with the &suse; account you or your organization uses to manage subscriptions. In case you do not have a &suse; account yet, go to the &scc; homepage () to create one.
Enter the Registration Code you received with your copy of &sles;. Proceed with Next to start the registration process.

By default the system is registered with the &scc;. However, if your organization provides local registration servers you can either choose one form the list of auto-detected servers or provide the URl at Register System via local SMT Server. Proceed with Next.
